channel.title: Rhino.Render.UI on Hugo based API Site
channel.description: Recent content in Rhino.Render.UI on Hugo based API Site

item.title: UserInterfaceSection
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Render.UI Custom user interface section manager [Obsolete] public class UserInterfaceSection Properties RenderContent RenderContent The RenderContent object that created this user interface object. since 5.1 object Window The user control associated with this user interface object. since 5.1 Methods static UserInterfaceSection FromWindow(object window) Find the UserInterfaceSection that created the specified instance of a window. Returns - If a UserInterfaceSection object is found containing a reference to the requested window then return the object otherwise return null.

item.title: WorldMapDayNight
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.Render.UI public class WorldMapDayNight : IDisposable Constructors WorldMapDayNight() since 6.0 Methods void Dispose() since 6.0 bool HasMapForCurrentSettings() since 6.0 System.Drawing.Point LocationToMap(Point2d latlong) since 6.0 void MakeMapBitmap() since 6.0 System.Drawing.Image Map() since 6.0 Rhino.Geometry.Point2d MapToLocation(Point mapPoint) since 6.0 void SetDayNightDisplay(bool bOn) since 6.0 void SetEnabled(bool bEnabled) since 6.0 void SetTimeInfo(DateTime dt,double timezone,int daylightSavingMinutes,bool bDaylightSavingsOn) since 6.0
